client_description_Summary_Note:
Matilda Heta Tolvanen and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Matilda Heta Tolvanen is a 22 year old and comes from Finland.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
client_description_Family_Background: Matilda Heta Tolvanen is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Matilda obtained her secondary school diploma from Varkauden lukio in 2022.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Matilda Heta Tolvanen is a 22 year old and comes from Finland.
Matilda Heta Tolvanen did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not save any money from her earnings.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited a significant sum of 2100000 EUR from her grandmother, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2016, which she has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
